project_descr: Supporting Yemen’s economic diversification through supporting promising sectors (agriculture, fisheries, tourism and industry and trade) in Yemen

outputs.output_descr: Capacities for sustainable employment creation in industry & manufacturing improved.
Capacities for sustainable management of fishery resources enhanced.
Non-oil based development strategy formulated, inter-sectoral linkages and synergies increased and sectoral implementation plans developed.
Capacities for productivity enhancement in agriculture sector improved in a gender-sensitive manner.
Capacity for tourism policy development enhanced and pilot projects identified.
